amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding to the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe, Salaries and Expenses.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe, Salaries and Expenses by $2,908,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 353, 1 Present (Roll no. 463).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 353, 1 Present (Roll no. 463).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
